title: nuco.cloud
author: nuco.cloud
content: We will be launching the following products by the end of Q1 2023 (March 2023)nuco.cloud GOThis product is making progress and will be ready to launch soon. Both the wallet test for the TLOS based token and bridging via pNetwork was successful.nuco.cloud PRO & nuco.cloud CUSTOMBoth products are making progress and will be ready to launch by the end of March 2023.The first server has been created at a partnership datacenter and is working successfully.The CRM is installed and operating.We are currently testing payment options and a price comparison tool will be available.
